name: Dimensional Servant
description:
How deep can you go into space?

Oh no! You need to get deep into space to get away from (something)! How deep can you go without crashing?

(Keep in mind that this version [1.0] was made to make the Ludum Dare Game Jam time limit [in which was not meant :(], and there are multiple things that we couldn't add due to the time contraints, like multiple planets and more obstacles that aren't asteroids. So, stay tuned for more of this game (hopefully!)
